leve.name: Putting on Airs (L)
leve.description: Deviled eggs are a favorite of one of the Vault's more exalted priests, and it is unfortunate, as anyone who eats them are prone to breaking loud odorous winds. As a banquet is being prepared for his nameday, I dreaded to see the dish on the banquet menu. We would like to prepare giant artichoke hearts with which to grind into the tea for accompanying the meal, which calms the stomach so that the church service afterwards is not interrupted by a cacophony of offending noises.
leve.client: Order of the Friars Templar, Brother Padilloux
